lead_paragraph: Fake news has become a partisan tool, but people differ widely on their ability to discern what is real and what is fabrication.

headline.print_headline: As Fake News Spreads Lies, More Readers Shrug at Truth
headline.main: As Fake News Spreads Lies, More Readers Shrug at the Truth

snippet: Fake news has become a partisan tool, but people differ widely on their ability to discern what is real and what is fabrication....
abstract: Experts warn proliferation of fake news online is warping reality and creating confusion that leaves reader doubting everything, including valid reporting; phenomenon has allowed those on left and right to become more entrenched in their positions, rather than challenging them or examining them objectively.
